dimensions.name: Cognitive Intelligence
dimensions.description: Problem-solving, analytical thinking, and information processing.

dimensions.name: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: Self-awareness, emotional regulation, empathy, and interpersonal effectiveness.

dimensions.name: Relational Intelligence
dimensions.description: Depth of connection, attunement, reciprocity, and nurturing healthy relationships.

dimensions.name: Communication Intelligence
dimensions.description: Clarity, tone, active listening, storytelling, and nuanced expression.

dimensions.name: Spiritual Intelligence
dimensions.description: Inner peace, presence, non-reactivity, and connection to something beyond the self.

dimensions.name: Physical Intelligence
dimensions.description: Body awareness, health maintenance, fitness, recovery, and longevity practices.

dimensions.name: Aesthetic Intelligence
dimensions.description: Sensitivity to beauty, harmony, visual-spatial awareness, and environment design.

dimensions.name: Adversity Quotient
dimensions.description: Resilience, grit, adaptability, and the ability to grow from setbacks.

dimensions.name: Financial Intelligence
dimensions.description: Money management, investing, risk-taking, and long-term financial planning.

dimensions.name: Romantic Intelligence
dimensions.description: Intimacy, attraction, polarity, sexuality, and romantic compatibility awareness.

dimensions.name: Householder Intelligence
dimensions.description: Ability to run a functional, emotionally warm, and physically organized household.

dimensions.name: Cultural Intelligence
dimensions.description: Openness to diverse perspectives, cross-cultural fluency, and respect for traditions.

dimensions.name: Meta Intelligence
dimensions.description: Awareness of one's own mind, beliefs, ego patterns, and psychological defense mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Execution Intelligence
dimensions.description: Getting things done consistently and effectively, converting vision to reality.

dimensions.name: Kindness Quotient
dimensions.description: Capacity to give without expectation, treat others with grace, and act from compassion.
